name: Sweet & Spicy BBQ Chicken Skewers
description: Chicken skewers are a summertime fave! With a sweet glaze and just the right amount of spicy kick, there’s something for the whole family here. Whether you're hosting a summer gathering or simply craving a quick and delicious grilled meal, these skewers will hit the spot. Add some Roasted Garlic Aioli on the side, or thread sliced veggies onto the skewers with the chicken.
preparation: Slice chicken lengthwise into four to five pieces per breast.
Sprinkle rub on chicken strips and massage to coat.
Grill over medium-high heat, turning often, for 10–15 min, until chicken is cooked through.
In Prep Bowl, melt jelly in microwave, uncovered, about 30 sec.
Place skewers on a serving platter. Using a basting brush, brush cooked chicken with melted jelly.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups mixed greens, 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing, and 1 cup grilled corn or potatoes.
